titles.title: UAC State Notification Act of 2021
To require notification of a Governor of a State if an unaccompanied alien child is placed for custody and care in the State.
UAC State Notification Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
UAC State Notification Act of 2021
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services or the Department of Homeland Security to notify a state at least 48 hours before placing an unaccompanied alien child in the care of a proposed custodian in that state.
